steps.content:

In our game:

  • Players trade commodities all the time
  • Each trade is either a BUY or SELL
  • We track the volume of each
  • We calculate pressure from the ratio

steps.title: The Demand Ratio Formula
steps.content:
We measure market pressure with a simple ratio:

demandRatio = buyVolume / (buyVolume + sellVolume)

What does each ratio mean?

0.0 = Only sellers, no buyers (CRASH! Price plummets) 0.2 = 1 buyer per 4 sellers (Panic selling) 0.5 = Equal buyers and sellers (Balanced market) 0.8 = 4 buyers per seller (High demand) 1.0 = Only buyers, no sellers (MOON! Price skyrockets)

steps.content:
